revision.text: ==Classical Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== '''[[yaotl|yāōtl]]''' "enemy; (in compounds) war" + '''[[miqui]]''' "to die" ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nci|/jaːoːmiki/}} ===Verb=== {{head|nci|verb|head=yāōmiqui}} # To [[die]] in [[battle]]. ===References=== * Andrews, J. Richard. (2003) ''Workbook for Introduction to Classical Nahuatl, Revised Edition'' University of Oklahoma Press, p. 266. [[Category:nci:Military]]
